TopicTitle: Not enough shooting is KSP? Check this out.

Articles.Content:
http://www.scrapsgame.com/

It's a build-your-own combat car game. Looks like fun, and I know there are people that for some reason keep trying to get combat into KSP, this might fill their need.
Reminds me like http://robocraftgame.com/ but with less online-free-stuff.

tried it, it sucks that it will be a P2P.

it is a bit like robocraft, but a LOT more limited.

performance on my dinosaur was actually not half bad.
They're running a Kickstarter at the moment: http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/nition/scraps-customisable-vehicle-combat-for-windows-mac
